beer.beer_description: Everything you could ever need from a New England Style IPA. A big pillowy mouth feel provided by a huge dose of both Voyager Malted Oats and Flaked Oats while Chit and Wheat malt provide that final dose of protein heavy malts. This is all layered on top of Voyager Atlas Malt, as a base. All the hopping starts in the whirlpool with Citra Cryo, El Dorado Cryo and Strata, for big citrus, tropical fruits and dank flavours. The addition of Riwaka and Spectrum Citra in the dry hop take the aroma to new levels with sweet tropical citrus fruits. Fermented with New England style yeast, this is a true beer lover’s delight.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 150 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 31!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 230 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 47!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 115 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 24!

items.badge_description: Celebrate women and non-binary individuals in craft beer! Every year the Pink Boots Society (PBS) hosts Collaboration Brew Day where teams come together to brew a collab beer that supports the PBS mission to support, inspire, and encourage the professional development of women and non-binary people in the industry. Learn more

It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

items.badge_description: In our best David Attenborough impression Ah... and here we see the rare Leap Beer badge. More elusive than the rarest of beers, the Leap Beer badge emerges once every four years to share what liquid libations are being enjoyed by its numerous earners across the globe. The badge makes its appearance known widely across the community, but quickly returns to its long slumber, not set to emerge again for another four long years...
